Plot: Heat rises in the coldest New York winter of a century. The bizarre murder of a parish priest at a bondage club pits NYPD Nikki Heat against a vicious drug lord, an arrogant CIA contractor, and a shadowy death squad. The conspiracy reaches the top of the NYPD. When she gets too near the truth, Nikki is disgraced, stripped of her badge, and on her own as a target for killers. She can only trust reporter Jameson Rook.
Characters: Nikki Heat, Jameson Rook, Father Gerald Graf, Miguel Ochoa, Lauren Parry
Setting: New York City, New York (United States)
